properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 6 at 10:29PM EST until February 8 at 2:12AM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia...

West Chickamauga Creek near Fort Oglethorpe affecting Catoosa and
Hamilton Counties

Lookout Creek near New England affecting Dade and Hamilton
Counties

South Chickamauga Creek near Ringgold affecting Catoosa County

The Flood Warning continues for
The West Chickamauga Creek near Fort Oglethorpe.
* Until late Friday night.
* At 1015 PM Thursday the stage was 11.3 feet, and rising.
* Minor flooding is occurring, and minor flooding is forecast to
continue.
* Flood stage is 11 feet.
* The river will continue rising, reaching near 11.5 feet Friday
morning. The river is expected to fall below flood stage Friday
evening.
* At 11 feet, minor flooding begins of the woodlands and fields near
the creek upstream and downstream from the gage on the Georgia
Highway 146, or Cloud Springs Road bridge. Minor flooding of the
creek can also be expected further downstream as it crosses the
Tennessee border into the south East Ridge area.

NWSheadline: Flood Warning extended until late Friday night
